channel.title: Experience gained?
channel.description: i can't seem to find where i could change the experience gained when using a skill. Could someone point me in the right direction but without telling me what to do as i would like to learn :)

item.title: Experience gained?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

I don’t want to sound mean, but this post was last replied to about 2 years ago. If you continue to post on topics that happened a long time ago, it is going to lead to many complaints from other members. But to answer your question, go into your client.java file, and search

FightType == 1

You should see a line with

TotalExp = (double) (### * hitDiff);

Just change the number symbols into what you want the exp per damage to be. Also, make sure you change it for all types of combat, or else, you will only be changing what exp is given per damage when using the accurate fight type.

Read full topic

item.title: Experience gained?
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

case 823:
You should see something like this below it
Code:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You Attack The Dummy.”);
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((150playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((300playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 12;
}
break;

To change the experience gained just change the 150, 300 and the other 150.

^

Object training.

Read full topic
